doc:
Robert Englund https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Englund 0 Robert Barton Englund (born June 6, 1947) is an American actor, voice actor, singer, and director, best known for playing the infamous serial killer Freddy Krueger in the Nightmare on Elm Street film series. He received a Saturn Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor for A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors in 1987 and A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master in 1988. Englund is a classically trained actor. Robert_Barton_Englund ( born June_6_,_1947 ) is an_American_actor , voice_actor , singer , and director , best_known for playing the_infamous_serial_killer_Freddy_Krueger in the_Nightmare on Elm_Street_film_series . He received a_Saturn_Award_nomination for Best_Supporting_Actor for A_Nightmare on Elm_Street_3 : Dream Warriors in 1987 and A_Nightmare on Elm_Street_4 : The_Dream_Master in 1988 . Englund is a_classically_trained_actor .
